attributes.action: Put any person arriving on these shores without the correct/valid paperwork back on the boat, train or aeroplane upon which they arrived IMMEDIATELY !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People arriving in this country should have it made clear to them and those who follow that you cannot just wonder in and expect to stay at tax payers expense. This  cannot be too difficult to implement as we are after all an island !
